metadata.name: PowerShell ADRecon Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of ADRecon.ps1 for AD reconnaissance which has been reported to be actively used by FIN7

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('function get-adrexcelcomob')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-adrgpo')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-adrdomaincontroller')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('adrecon-report.xlsx'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of ADRecon.ps1 for AD reconnaissance which has been reported to be actively used by FIN7
